title: Smoke and weather
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and William Greaves
brief_description: During the fire season, look-out men keep constant vigilance for the first sign of smoke, scanning the territory for miles around. How they are trained for the work and how their efforts save many valuable stands of timber are illustrated at a fire tower in the Forestry Branch’s Petawawa Forest Experiment Station in Ontario.
